materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph featuring a neogothic stone monument. The monument is tall and narrow, with a cross at the top. There is a statue of a man holding a book in the centre. The monument is on a flight of steps, and is surrounded by a gate. In the background, there is a church. The photograph has a few tears and folds especially at the top corners.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Neo-gothic monument in front of church
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Monuments Gothic revival (Architecture) Church buildings
